entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Rocky Mountain House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:21 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.7°C

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:07 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
